code: import React from'react';import'./Footer.css';import{Link}from'react-scroll';import{menu,socialHandles}from'../../data';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{id:"footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section__wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav__link__container",children:menu.map((list,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{activeClass:"active",className:"nav__link",to:list.name.toLowerCase(),spy:true,smooth:true,offset:-70,duration:500,children:list.name},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"social__handles__container",children:socialHandles.map((list,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:list.link,className:"social__handle",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:list.icon},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"copyright__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Copyright \xA9 All rights reserved | 2024"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text__muted",children:"Design & Built by Mustafa Hassan"})]})]})});};export default Footer;
